mapper.insert: insert into busybGroup(group_code, group_name, group_info, leader_name, leader_id, regidate) values (left(md5(rand()), 8), #{group_name}, #{group_info}, #{leader_name}, #{leader_id}, now())
insert into busybGroupMem(id, group_code, regidate) values (#{id}, #{group_code}, now())
mapper.select: select b.group_code, group_name, group_info, leader_name, leader_id, b.regidate from busybGroupMem a, busybGroup b where a.group_code = b.group_code and a.id = #{id};

select * from busybGroup where 1=1
and group_code like concat('%', #{search}, '%')
and group_name like concat('%', #{search}, '%')
and leader_name like concat('%', #{search}, '%')
and leader_id like concat('%', #{search}, '%')
mapper.insert: insert into noti(to_id, from_id, group_code, regidate) values(#{to_id}, #{from_id}, #{group_code}, now())
